condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When using the , I receive unusual error messages or warnings that seem to be originating from Eclipse (as opposed to the usual messages that come from Oxygen).

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This problem could be caused by the Language Servers support in Eclipse. Certain enabled language servers could send unexpected errors or warnings to the .

steps-informal.p: Go to Preferences Language Servers and disable the language servers that could be sending the errors.
